Package com.example.final_project_android

Class Question

java.lang.Object
com.example.final_project_android.Question
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.os.Parcelable
public class Question extends Object implements android.os.Parcelable
Represents a question in the quiz, including the question text, options, and correct answer. Implements Parcelable to allow passing Question objects between activities.

  • Nested Class Summary
